pr_title: Add `CloudState` to be passed to `Cloud#provision` and `Cloud#canProvision` methods.

timeline.message:
Add CloudState to be passed to Cloud#provision and Cloud#canProvision methods

This gives more insight to the Cloud implementation to ongoing
provisioning operations and helps implement better control on the number
of nodes provisioned when provisioning limits are defined.

timeline.author: jglick

timeline.bodyText: Curious as to why this has to be synchronized
timeline.author: res0nance

replies.bodyText: It doesn't need to be, this comes from copy-paste from StrategyState. In CloudState it's just readonly so I'll remove it.
replies.author: Vlatombe

timeline.author: Vlatombe

timeline.bodyText: Found a problem with this aproach if there are several levels of subclassing. I wonder if there is already a utility covering this case in the Jenkins codebase...
timeline.author: Vlatombe

timeline.message: Replace the override logic with Util.isOverridden

timeline.bodyText: You can create a private method to avoid duplicating this method, kinda callIfOverriden passing the code to call. WDYT?
timeline.author: MRamonLeon

timeline.message: Refactor the logic to call only if overridden
